title: Saw
overview: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

title: Saw II
overview: A detective and his team must rescue eight people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.

title: Saw III
overview: Jigsaw kidnaps a doctor to keep him alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen through a brutal test.

title: Saw IV
overview: Despite Jigsaw's death, Detective Hoffman and Agent Strahm are both expected to continue the game.

title: Saw V
overview: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but the game is not over.

title: Saw VI
overview: Special Agent Strahm is dead, and Detective Hoffman has emerged as the unchallenged successor to Jigsaw's legacy.

title: Saw: The Final Chapter
overview: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gather to seek the support of a self-help guru who survived the killer's carnage.

title: Jigsaw
overview: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one man: John Kramer.

title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw
overview: A criminal mastermind unleashes a twisted form of justice in Spiral, the terrifying new chapter from the book of Saw.
